welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Daganzo de Arriba, a charming city known for its rich history and breathtaking landscapes. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and discover all the hidden gems our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for military flights and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Barajas Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving a large number of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, mainly used for long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited to certain areas and have a time limit.
